name: Doggo
storyline: Get ready to search high and low for your dog house, collecting lost dogs, hats and bones along the way. Bury your bone to create a special healing spot for future runs. Watch out for the spikes and purple snails or you will need to take a bite out of your limited dog treats!
summary: Dog-based speed running platformer. Featuring Online Leaderboards, 20+ levels and over 35 collectable cosmetics for your dog.
